headline: Duke Energy restores power to 131,000 following Fern, offers tips as colder weather continues to drive high energy use
summary: Duke Energy crews are repairing damaged equipment and restoring service to customers across the Carolinas after Winter Storm Fern – and the company is offering simple ways for those with power to manage energy use as cold weather lingers.

headline: A Look At Duke Energy (DUK) Valuation As Long Term Returns Contrast With Recent Share Price Softness
summary: Event context and why Duke Energy (DUK) is on investors’ radar Duke Energy (DUK) has come into focus after its recent trading performance, with shares closing at US$117.43 and short term returns moving in different directions over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Duke Energy. Zooming out from the recent pullback, Duke Energy’s 1-year total shareholder return of 8.04% and 5-year total shareholder return of 53.34% contrast with its softer 90-day share price...
